statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE batch_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name DESC, expiration_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, batch_number FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE batch_number LIKE 'AB%';
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT * FROM batch_numbers;
SELECT product_name FROM batch_numbers ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT batch_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers WHERE batch_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM batch_numbers WHERE expiration_date < '2023-12-31';
SELECT expiration_date, manufacturing_date FROM expiration_dates ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM batch_numbers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers WHERE batch_id > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM batch_numbers INNER JOIN expiration_dates ON batch_numbers.batch_id = expiration_dates.batch_id WHERE expiration_dates.manufacturing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(expiration_date) AS latest_expiration_date FROM batch_numbers;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(batch_id) AS total_batches FROM batch_numbers GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_batches > 5 ORDER BY total_batches DESC;
SELECT * FROM batch_numbers;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_id, manufacturer FROM product_information ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, quantity, production_date FROM batch_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT batch_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers JOIN batch_tracking ON batch_numbers.batch_id = batch_tracking.batch_id WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM batch_numbers;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, quantity, production_date FROM batch_tracking WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, description FROM product_information WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc' OR manufacturer = 'XYZ Ltd';
SELECT batch_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM batch_numbers JOIN batch_tracking ON batch_numbers.batch_id = batch_tracking.batch_id;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Batch WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, name, location FROM Manufacturer ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT id, batch_number FROM Batch WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, location, phone_number FROM Manufacturer WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, batch_number, expiration_date FROM Batch WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT p.id, p.name, b.quantity, i.location FROM Product p JOIN Batch b ON p.id = b.product_id JOIN Inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity > 0;

SELECT DISTINCT p.name, m.name AS manufacturer_name, i.location FROM Product p JOIN Manufacturer m ON p.id = m.id JOIN Inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id WHERE i.quantity < 10 ORDER BY p.name ASC, i.location DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductBatches;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ProductBatches WHERE batch_number = 1001;
SELECT inventory_id, product_id, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Warehouses WHERE location = 'New York' AND capacity >= 1000;
SELECT product_name, description FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ProductBatches WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM ProductBatches WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM Warehouses ORDER BY capacity DESC, warehouse_id ASC;
